sentences.sContent: They exerted considerable influence within the school.
sentences.sCn: 他们在校内施加了很大的影响力。

sentences.sContent: Environmental groups are exerting pressure on the government to tighten pollution laws.
sentences.sCn: 环境保护组织在向政府施加压力，要求从严执行环保法律法规。

sentences.sContent: ...I think what really matters is to make better choice and exert more discipline...

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ ert(能量， 活动) → 尽(力)， 运用

trans.tranOther: to use your power, influence etc in order to make something happen
